Title: Relates to providing a tax abatement for geothermal well systems in N.Y. city
Summary: Provides a tax abatement for geothermal well systems in cities of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd Art 4 Title 4-C Title Head, §§499-aaaa - 499-ffff, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing a tax abatement for geothermal well systems in cities of one million or more
